website_summaries.verdict: Trickle charger that uses a solar panel to keep your battery charged.
pros: Just connect the solar charger to your battery, and it will deliver power in any location, even when you're nowhere near a power outlet
Ships with a cigarette lighter port adapter and alligator clips, but it does not ship with ring connectors for certain batteries

customer_reviews.title: This charger works great. The blue light lets you know it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use on my camping trailer. I have two 12 volts batteries. This charger works great. The blue light lets you know it is charging. And it is waterproof. I bolted the charger onto my trailer using the two holes in it from the factory. Then I cut the battery clamps off the end of the cord and installed connections to mount it on the positive and negitive battery post. This way I still have the two prong plug to disconnect it if need. If the blue light does not come on, you have your positive and negative wires connected to the wrong battery post.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and well built!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Sunway Solar Car Battery Charger to maintain a marine deep cycle battery. I purchased the battery as part of an off-grid solar system. Since I bought the battery before purchasing the Renogy 100 watt Solar Starter kit, I needed a way to keep my battery charged and healthy in the meantime. The Sunway Solar Charger was very simple to use and charges (based on the blinking blue light) even in shady times of day. I'm very pleased and once I order my Renogy system, I'll have a handy solar charger for my boat battery.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Powers

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my trolling motor battery charged
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my Jon boat to keep the trolling motor battery charging while we're out. It's a trickle charge, not a full charging unit, but helps to keep the battery going longer while we're fishing.
customer_reviews.author: William N. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this brand. Made mount for charger to keep generator and winch batteries topped off. Like the flashing LED so you know it's working. Also the long cord is a plus. Reaches everything with room to spare. If it lasts for awhile and does it's job will definitely buy over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Sunway Solar Car Battery Trickle Charger helps the Barrery a lot.
customer_reviews.text: This Sunway Solar Car Battery Trickle Charger helps maintain my battery. I don't drive a lot, and I was always worried about my battery running down. Then I would need to idle my car for an hour to recharge the battery. A mechanic told me that was not good for the battery... and that a trickle charger was the best. This one is working fine for me. Update I needed a replacement. And I was sent one promptly. It is great service and I just put it to work. I have a feeling this one will work great for a long time. Again, Martin made quick excellent communication.
customer_reviews.author: Forest7

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful device!
customer_reviews.text: So far so bueno. Got this guy to keep the battery on my travel trailer going, it is parked too far from the house to keep it plugged in all the time. It charges when it's overcast which is great. Easy to use, this being my first solar product, the cord was long enough to put the panel inside the trailer, but it is tight so I purchased the extension cord kit. Overall I am happy with its performance thus far. Just an edit three years later to add that it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rushell

customer_reviews.title: No more dead battery
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my 1990 Suburban that was not making it from weekend to weekend due to a drain somewhere(most likely Viper alarm system). So far my truck has started strong each time since.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Greene

customer_reviews.title: Handy trickle charger for your car.
customer_reviews.text: I have a car that I only drive every couple of months or so. That allows the battery to run down from the drain caused by the anti-theft system for the car and the radio unit. This trickle charge keeps the battery topped up so I don't have to worry about not being able to start the car when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. completely useless on a normal car battery
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. completely useless on a normal car battery. The little blue light blinks indicating it is getting sunlight. But the miniscule amount of power (if any at all) will not keep a normal car battery even slightly topped. Don't waste your money. Back to reading reviews for a solar charger that might actually work... n Wish I could give 0 stars
customer_reviews.author: john frederick

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Used the solar charger one time. This charger is worthless, a waste of $37.99., of course I find this out after 30 days. I tow a car behind my motorhome for extended periods, and the battery would go dead because of something running in the background. I hooked the charger to a fully charged battery, and when I stopped for the evening, six hours later, the battery was dead. I had to jump start the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning customer assistance! My first Sunway either never worked or broke after a while. I couldn’t tell because the LED light on it was working but my car battery would not stay charged even though it was a new battery and the car’s charging system is fine. The car just doesn’t get driven often. The vendor was easy to contact via email and responded very quickly. They sent me several replacements to ensure I had a working solar charger as quickly as possible. The first one I received worked and they told me to keep the others as spares! It’s now been over a month so I am certain that this solar battery maintainer is working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs Rule!

customer_reviews.title: Solar battery trickle charger works as described, couldn't be happier :)
customer_reviews.text: It works, omg this is great! We had to replace our truck's battery a few times because we don't drive it very much and forget to drive it around often enough to keep the battery alive a couple months. We returned the last battery because it only lasted 2 months so must have been defective. And with the new battery and this solar trickle charger, ooooweee, it's nice to be able to rely on the truck starting. Embarrassing to agree to loan it when it won't start ;(. Recommend to anyone who has to let their vehicle sit around alot.
customer_reviews.author: What's4dinner?

customer_reviews.title: Working fine
customer_reviews.text: I'm been using this on my '06 Powerstroke pickup for a while now. I sometimes don't drive the truck for 2-3 weeks, and the batteries (dual) would be marginal after sitting for so long. This little solar panel keeps up with that parasitic loss, so it starts good after a long sit. I just lay this on the dash, with the windshield facing southwest. I don't even bother with the suction cups, just lay it flat on the dash. Works fine. Don't expect it to charge your weak battery. Driving will charge your battery, then this little device will keep them fresh for as long as you want.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Pounds

customer_reviews.title: Is working well after two months
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a quality item, unlike the same manufacturer's 7Amp charge controller that is absolute trash. Unlike the controller, that was tossed into a bubble envelope with no protection against damage (by the seller and not by Amazon) and it cost me a new battery when it failed This solar panel was well-packaged and the included attachments have worked well for two months. I am hoping that it will last a good while longer (no moving parts), and without collateral damage if it doesn't. I'd never buy a matching controller of this brand again, and I will post again if and when this panel goes bad.
customer_reviews.author: kix66

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof at all
customer_reviews.text: "The charger can withstand splashing and water, but it should not be submerged in water." Okay, so setting it atop a tractor in the sun shouldn't be a problem, right? Probably lasted a month or so. I left this hooked up for three months two years ago, when I went back the battery was dead, so was the unit. Tore it open and water intrusion had corroded several components so it was irreparable. Waste of time/money. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Paine

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to trickle charge my rv battery. I attached it to the propane tank cover, and left it for a week. Everyday was a bright, sunny one. At the end of the week the battery was dead. I couldn't see any defects in the clips or the wiring, but it didn't work. I will be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Purrfectionist

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: At first when trying to use this charger my desire was to replace my Battery Tender 800. I hooked it up to the the existing Battery Tender battery leads and nothing. I immediately thought the Solar Charger was bad. The next day I connected the Solar Charger to my truck using the supplied leads and it work. HMM, back to the boat and used the supplied leads and it worked. Damn, I really wanted to use the leads that are bolted to my battery. Very disappointed they are not compatible!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: No more dead car battery due to Viper alarm
customer_reviews.text: I've used this twice now on my GMC Yukon while out of town for a week, and am currently out of town as I type this review so this will make it three times... My Viper alarm used to kill my battery within a week of sitting there parked in my driveway, but now when I get home the truck fires right up with no issues. I just place the panel on the dash board and plug it in to my charging port. Hasn't given me any issues with my battery and no over charging either. This was the best thing I could've bought to solve my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Failed
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well made. Time will tell, so I can’t call it for now. Easy to hook up to my Jetta and immeiately began trickle charging the battery. According to VW this car was factory equipped with a solar trickle charger unit. Now less than a year of use, the unit has completely failed taking my car battery with it. We were really counting on this to keep our battery up doing this period of pandemic. The car not being used much, it was essential to have an exterior way to charge. We don’t have utility power here and this worked well until it FAILED!
customer_reviews.author: W&B Bush

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to connect to my sons ATV which seems to constantly have battery issues. We keep it in a shed, so this kit worked perfectly for me. Mounted the solar panel on the roof of the shed, and it came with more than enough cabling to run into the shed and connect to battery. It’s also small enough to remove from the mount and take with us on long atv rides. Battery is fully charged every time we go to use it. Well built all around.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Breslin

customer_reviews.title: saved me from a dead battery
customer_reviews.text: I park in a lot, unfortunately no access to a plug for a tender and the battery in my car is not easily removed. I bought it to just maintain the battery over long periods but I recently had a dead battery due to an electrical problem (now fixed). Figured I would see if it would charge the battery and it did over 1-2 days. Checked voltage and saw 11.7v and it cranked!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Zuczek

customer_reviews.title: This will NOT charge your battery
customer_reviews.text: The unit works well but as it states in the small print, it is only for maintaining your battery. It will prevent fast drain but it will not fully charge your car or marine battery.
customer_reviews.author: honest bloke

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well in tinted RV glass applications.
customer_reviews.text: Cord length too short to run from panel to battery. Had to order extension. The on line order info on Amazon does mention that it doesn’t work well with tinted glass which my RV has. It did state so in the instructions which came with the box. I noticed this after my 30 day return ran out. At this point I just hope that some trickle charge does get through. I just haven’t had it installed long enough to tell yet.
customer_reviews.author: Running on Empty

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this to work
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of folks we're not driving our vehicles as much these days. So i wanted a good way to keep the batteries topped up without running extension cords to the cars for a traditional tender. REALLY hoped this would do the trick. So far I've tried it on two vehicles. One with a brand new battery. Both batteries have drawn down to the point of not being able to start a car with this attached. IE...it didn't do anything. Both in full sun all day. If it were possible I'd return it but it's been too long. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me... if it doesn’t work for you immediately, return before time runs out!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work. I wish I had read the questions and answers and seen all the comments about how it didn’t work. I’m disappointed. It’s past time to return it as I gave it a second and third try because I was trying out all the possible ways to use it. By the way, if Las Vegas sun cant make it keep your battery charged, I don’t know what would. I just bought a new battery and will drive the car more often even when there is no place to go during this lockdown. Updated: My battery was not new. Maybe that’s why it didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works as adverstised!
customer_reviews.text: We have a pickup truck that we only use a few times a year for hauling trash to the dump or tree cuttings to the clean green recycle facility. The rest of the time it sits in the driveway, and we forget to start it occasionally to keep the battery charged. For the last couple of years, we'd get out a long extension cord and hook up the battery charger before we needed to use the truck. Now, we've attached this solar charger to the passenger side window where it gets direct sunlight most of the day. Problem solved, always a full battery.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: edit: worked great until it didn't. It stopped charging after about 3 months. Used to output about 18vDC in direct sunlight and flash the blue LED anytime in daylight, now outputs less than 1v(and the led has gone dark), which is of course useless to maintain a 12v battery. original: Installing this panel on the dashboard of my truck has eliminated the occasional dead battery due to a mystery current leak. Would it be better to find the source? Yeah, but this does just fine with minimal effort. Don't expect it to charge a dead battery in less than a month, but it does a great job of keeping one topped off.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lifsey

customer_reviews.title: it dosnt work do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: i installed this and have a direct sunlight but its just doesn't strong enough to charge the battery. do not waste your money I forgot to open it and when I did its too latew to return I wish I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Works but plastic case melted in the sun. Longevity a concern.
customer_reviews.text: Kept my my car battery charged after 7 weeks of being plugged in so it did the job. Car was in the Florida sun so internal car temperatures must have been super hot, but sdisappointed to see the plastic melt and split the unit apart. I expected this charger to withstand the heat since it relies on solar power. Please use bettter quality materials that can withstand the heat. Missed the return window so now I’m stuck with this unit. I’ll be looking elsewhere for a new charger.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have used this car battery tender twice while away for more than a week with good results. I like that it is solar since I normally park in the airport garage with no access to an outlet, and that it works in low light and possibly even artificial light. I always park in a space facing south with the panel on the dash, but the car is in a garage, so the light is not direct.
customer_reviews.author: scuba traveler

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive 12v battery trickle charger for my EV. Electric vehicles still depend on a functioning 12v battery for electronics and accessories. Be sure and get the 5w monocrystalline version, which is exactly the same size as the 4w version - 25% more capacity for just a dollar more. Build and material quality not bad for low-end Chinese electronics. Mandarin-English translation on the instructions a real hoot.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Steele

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to leave it outside all the time to keep a marine battery charged... I'm not sure if I just missed it in the description or if it isn't mentioned but the instructions that came with it says its not water proof, only splash resistant.. I live in Florida where it is very humid.. The morning dew alone will probably take this thing out, I guess we will find out. Not pleased that it isn't rain proof... as I was not wanting to go unhook it everytime it rains, again this is Florida.. It rains almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: perfect for RV
customer_reviews.text: I have hooked up this to our camper, i did put in inside i know the reviews said it is water proof but i am in the midwest and cold weather snow could be an issue.. That said works great i cut the cigarette lighter plug off and connected some ring terminals so I could unplug it in the off season. very easy to use and has keep the battery topped off even when the kids leave a light on inside LOL.. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, frame can crack in heat
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to keep battery charged in a seldom driven Mazda 3 with AGM battery. I place it on the dash and connect it to 12V power socket. It has done a great job of keeping the battery charged. I have not had a single episode of a discharged battery which was an ongoing problem before this. Heat on the dashboard in sun at 5000 feet of elevation is a little much for the plastic frame. After a year, it has warped in couple of spots and cracked in one. I now keep it on the seat instead where it gets indirect sun and still seems to work well enough for trickle charging.
customer_reviews.author: gonehiking

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality materials
customer_reviews.text: I'm in Southern California and temperatures could reach nearly 90 degrees by my house, and while using the Sunway Solar Car Battery Charger the plastic that it's built in began to deform and I was afraid that it could create a damage on my vehicle as the internal parts were showing. This device is meant to keep it under the sun and it should not get deform by the sun. Would not recommend it at all.
customer_reviews.author: RO RU

customer_reviews.title: Keep your vehicle battery topped off while you are parked.
customer_reviews.text: My car battery is new, but given the current situation right now with limited travel I don't run it very often. My car started to have low battery symptoms choking a bit on starting the car. Since I have this and keep it plugged in while not driving the battery stays fully charged and the problem has gone away. I think anyone in the same situation can benefit from this charger so your battery does not get damaged from draining.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob collins

customer_reviews.title: Simple easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for the battery on my RV Travel trailer. Set was simple and easy to use, manufacturer recommends inside vehicle out of the elements. However that was not an option for me; I kept mine in the bubble wrap, sealed with tape, and secured it on top of the battery case. Only reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars because it’s not weather proof. Other than that, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cold Iron Axe

customer_reviews.title: What I hate most about this Awesome Idea is ....
customer_reviews.text: WIRE IS SO FREAKING THIN !! It's smaller then Speaker Wire. I will Try this Idea Again but, with Better Product ! THICKER WIRE REQUIRED !! Cobra : )~
customer_reviews.author: CobraThomas

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I live in California, my sister lives in NYC. She keeps her old BMW here. This Solar Charger keeps her battery charged. For almost 2 years now, it starts every time because the car's battery is kept charged by this Solar Charger.
customer_reviews.author: ChipCdM

customer_reviews.title: Sun power
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these units. The first one didn’t have all the connectors and they replaced it no problem but the one they replaced it with was defective and the wires came off the cell and you can not put them back. I have tried to return it again and they won’t allow it. I would not recommend buying right his product. The seller would not even respond. They charged me for three. I only ended up with one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dunn

customer_reviews.title: This is doing a fair job with two deep cycle batteries
customer_reviews.text: I think this charger is keeping the charge level. I'm pretty sure it's not topping the batteries off. If it is capable of doing that, It's not doing it very fast. For the two batteries , I probably should have gotten a bigger unit. But even at break even, It's hard to complain.
customer_reviews.author: Travis R

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this item for marine use.
customer_reviews.text: I received the unit in a timely manner and connected it to my boat battery. The unit functioned properly for about a month and then it died. Although it was not exposed to the direct rain I suspect it couldn’t tolerate the damp Florida weather.
customer_reviews.author: Mister B

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This solar charger didn't do anything at all. The suction cup kept falling off the window. We installed it correctly, and YES - WE MADE SURE WE PLUGGED IN EACH ITEM IN THE CORRECT ORDER. But the battery didn't seem to receive any charge from it at all. Our battery was dead next time we wanted to use it. Very disappointed. Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mark Rodin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work - is trash
customer_reviews.text: I had this trickle charger plugged into my trailer battery for 2 weeks. The only battery drain was from a carbon dioxide monitor (minimal drain). This did not keep my battery topped up at all and my battery went from 6.89 to 6.45. The blue light was flashing so I know it was supposed to be working and it was in full daylight all day. It just does not work even to keep your battery charge topped up.
customer_reviews.author: Supercorgi

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help much in my fringe case...
customer_reviews.text: My car a 2007 Prius was draining battery to the point I had to jump it every morning and so we bought this to help out.. And it did, for awhile but if I left it for even a day without driving the car I still had to jump it. Also of note the suction cups suck, like they should not be used to hang the device from the glass. Obviously I had a fringe case, but I still feel the device should have kept it charged through two days... Regardless I had a weird case ymmv
customer_reviews.author: S. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: I assume it works great because she indicates it works well to keep her ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift for someone who does not use their car often...I assume it works great because she indicates it works well to keep her battery charged.
customer_reviews.author: H. S. Overman

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: They need to add a off switch to allow continuous connection for fast transit No one wants to lift the hood to disconnect or reconnect. Bottom line: upgrade the design fie.convenience
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Daly

customer_reviews.title: Did the exact opposite. Drained battery.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend has a Harley V Rod. I’ve owned motorcycles for fifteen years and never seen a smaller battery put in a more awful location. She was having problems keeping her battery charged. I bought this because I’ve had luck with other solar chargers keeping my bikes and cars happy while I was away. After a few days this left her bike totally drained and she had to call a tow truck to get it to the shop.
customer_reviews.author: Werehamster

customer_reviews.title: Very effective - simple to install.
customer_reviews.text: Strongly recommend this product. Had a small issue with a drain on the battery of my (very) old truck. Installed panel on dashboard and plugged it into the lighter socket - problem solved. Also bought one for my old boat to keep the battery charged for the mini bilge pump I installed. Again very easy to install and integrate with the small voltage charge control regulator they recommend you install as well.
customer_reviews.author: oldandintheway

customer_reviews.title: An RV-specific solar connector may be necessary to connect this unit to YOUR RV.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to maintain the charge on my RV batteries, which it does. Only very recently have I tried using it to charge my motorcycle battery. For that, it works REALLY well! At first, I was a confused about what seemed like a miswired connection, but after a quick exchange of emails with Sunway Customer Service, I am no longer confused. The Sunway Solar Car Battery Charger is a high-quality piece. It comes with multiple connections, a long cord and and two methods to mount it to a surface, making it totally portable. It has become the only battery charger I use! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.-Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I keep this sitting by the center console area and it's keeping my battery charged without direct sunlight. I'm afraid the plastic bezil might warp in the summer if I stick it up to the windshield, plus it would be more obvious that the car is sitting unused. My alarm system will kill the battery in a couple weeks without starting so now I don't have to unplug my battery.
customer_reviews.author: JLust

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to keep my batteries charged when I'm not driving the two vehicles. I installed a switch and hardwired it into my battery. They both work great. All I have to do is flip the switch off when I'm ready to start my engine and flip it back on when I turn it off. This way I don't have to disconnect anything.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bjornson

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well
customer_reviews.text: Does the job very well. I drive short distances several times a day, not enough to keep the car battery well charged.The car we own is always active sensing one thing or another. This trickle charger does the trick and keeps the battery from degrading. It is well made and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I had to leave my car for 4 months where there was no electricity to plug in my usual battery tender, so I bought this and just crossed my fingers it would work since I had no time to test it out before I left. I finally got back to my car this morning, turned the key over and the engine started immediately, effortlessly. It was so great. I really recommend this product. Just couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: SSM

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting a lot, but this seems to work really well as a battery maintainer. I tested the voltage and it is providing 12 volts when in direct light. I hooked it to an unused 12 volt lawnmower battery putting out 6 volts, and leaned the panel inside a window for a week of partially cloudy weather and it brought the battery back up to 12 volts when unhooked from the charger. Not bad. The battery was also sitting on a concrete floor, which supposedly drains them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping truck battery charged
customer_reviews.text: Needed solar panel to charge my truck as it sits all winter, and even with two batteries goes dead. I found after getting it that they recommended two panels if you had two batteries to keep charged. So buy another panel and the 2nd one was different looking than the first even though ordered from same place.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bunch

customer_reviews.title: not bad, but backwards
customer_reviews.text: works well, even in less-than-optimal conditions. i cut the cord to reverse polarity to match my battery tender equipped machines. makes it really nice. use it on ATVs, tractor, and mower. good value.
customer_reviews.author: the North

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work to charge my Lexus ES300
customer_reviews.text: I tried both the cig lighter and straight to battery and there is not enough Solar Power to charge the brand new battery.
customer_reviews.author: Secret7Agent

customer_reviews.title: Great battery charger and maintainer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger. I bought to mount in my new fishing boat and help boost batteries while fishing. However I have installed it in a window in my shop and it is keeping my boat batteries charged through these winter months. A great battery charger and battery saver!
customer_reviews.author: Zeroinlyndon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product is so easy to use, just attach it to the battery or if you have a “live” cigarette lighter input, use that with their attachment and you ready...
customer_reviews.author: Bob Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: OBDII Accessory Cable and SAE Polarity Reverse Adapter
customer_reviews.text: If you use this with a OBDII Accessory Cable, you may need SAE Polarity Reverse Adapter Connectors. Without the Polarity Reverse Adapter, the LED stops blinking, i.e. stops charging. Charging via the OBDII was a great option for me, because my particular vehicle cigarette lighter plugs are not powered with the vehicle ignition off.
customer_reviews.author: William Baumbach

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Left this hooked up to my battery all day while I was using the trolling motor. Never went dead. Seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: JJJ

customer_reviews.title: kinda dose not work.
customer_reviews.text: I used two of these on two different cars and both times it really didn't do what needed to be done. Admittedly the battery had gone down on one and it had to be put on the trickle charger. Once a battery is charged it should keep it charged up just fine. that was not the case.
customer_reviews.author: SakeCat

customer_reviews.title: Our forth one.....
customer_reviews.text: These work great for cars that sit for a while or travel trailers that are seldom used. We have never had a problem with any of them. The clamps for the battery terminals and lighter connection are great.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy Duty

customer_reviews.title: no trickle for my pickle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2019 harley sportster 1200, my garage doesnt have electricity, so i thought it would be the perfect fit. after reading some reviews as to why the blue light didnt blink when it was plugged into the bike (it does still blink when its disconnected) i thought that the battery was fully charged. well it wasnt, and now the battery is dead. i don't know if i need a different connector, or need to go directly to the battery, which in my opinion is not convenient, but its not working for me. definitely a cool gadget, im pretty sure it would charge something, but for my application, no dice. tldr doesnt charge the bike
customer_reviews.author: jordan berthiaume

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a slow drain on my truck battery, (ever since a new radio installed) so after 7-10 days the battery would be dead. So after reading reviews I ordered this charger, works great even after 30 days of not running the truck battery is fully charged! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: didn't charge my battery
customer_reviews.text: I left this set up for a week of full, all day sunshine, but it seemed to have zero impact on my battery's charge. I confirmed its working. it does put out a charge, but not capable of charging my truck battery. also, it was missing the suction cups. i contacted the seller by never received a reply.
customer_reviews.author: carlos castenada

customer_reviews.title: It works!  Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I have it sitting outdoors on the lawn all day, every day. It managed to charge up my deep cycle battery although it took a while as expected. Free electricity!
customer_reviews.author: MarylandY's

customer_reviews.title: This is a bright ideal .
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I don’t move my car for one or two weeks and this solar charger keeps my battery ffull charged , in the winter I park under a light at night so I never worry about my battery .
customer_reviews.author: doobiedoo

customer_reviews.title: Good product to keep stowed up craft batteries charged and maintained.
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I needed. It came with suction cups and quick disconnect to choose from 12vlt cig plug or direct battery connection. Perfect for my need to keep my boat batteries charged and maintained. I have two batteries in my boat and I ordered one for each battery.
customer_reviews.author: douglass gibson

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again....
customer_reviews.text: Great value. 40' RV with four batteries. Not intended to charge a dead battery, but rather "maintain" the battery's charge. Works VERY well. Now going to buy one for our 32' RV!
customer_reviews.author: Randy E McPherson

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE IT REALLY WELL
customer_reviews.text: This has been a most pleasant surprise. I have a Travel Trailer that sits out all the time and in freezing weather I am always afraid the battery will freeze and burst.. this has been the ideal way to take care of that problem... I LIKE IT REALLY WELL..
customer_reviews.author: MBrown

customer_reviews.title: A must for any RV motorhome owner!
customer_reviews.text: This trickle charger is so easy to use... just plug into your cigarette lighter (one that stays "hot" w/ no ignition key", make sure it gets some sunlight, and no more dead engine batteries after a couple weeks of your RV sitting in storage. It is solid and well built. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bearcat Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Wattage for San Francisco Fog
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product, but did not keep my SUV battery charged. San Francisco has fog of course and in the City full-on bright sunlight is rare. I upgraded to an 8 Watt unit and that works perfectly. The bigger unit takes up a lot more space, but I'd recommend that route if you don't always have full sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lofton

customer_reviews.title: Using to maintain a lawn tractor battery
customer_reviews.text: I've mounted the panel to side of the shed (not using the suction cups) where I store our lawn tractor, and extended the wire to reach the battery. Checking the voltage periodically and it seems to be maintaining the battery well. It beats taking the battery out to keep on a trickle charger in the garage through the winter.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL S CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This solar charger keeps my deep cycle marine battery pretty much fully charged all day. I have a 10’ boat that I use a 45lb trust trolly motor to get across the lake and I troll around the docks all day. When the charger is hooked up it seems to give the motor a little boost also!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Was great for 2 months. Didn’t overcharge, didn’t discharge at night, fairly inexpensive. Now no voltage or amperage output. Used to maintain 125cc motorcycle battery.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Solid trickle charger
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my truck with a rear view mirror that is hardwired (it would kill the battery if I didn't drive it for a week or so). This solved the issue completely.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Keeps battery charged.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, with an extra vehicle kept in storage the solar panel placed in garage window gets full sun and not exposed to the weather elements. So no comment on suction or water resistant. Other then that works great! Though you may need to purchase an extension wire.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado_Kayaker

customer_reviews.title: Good product & value
customer_reviews.text: It kept my trolling kayak battery at top level power in sunny day. I spent a full day fishing around the lake. But after the sunset with no sun shine for the panel, the battery power was at the lowest power and weak. I had to paddle my boat to the shore. However, the price is right and I'm impressed with the product performance.
customer_reviews.author: Alex1012

customer_reviews.title: Lost it before I could use it
customer_reviews.text: Seamed ok used it to charge my dump trailers. But forgot to take it off before leaving so only had it for 3 hrs before it got ran over will get another one soon
customer_reviews.author: russruss

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this charger to keep the battery in a car I store outside for eight months charged and ready when I return. This is the first time I’ve tried it so I won’t have an answer to weather it worked or not till January. I have it a favorable review because it came as advertised and was easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Sech239

customer_reviews.title: VERY EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO SET UP AND HAS MULTIBLE WAYS TO USE EITHER THROUGH INSIDE OR BATTERY HOOK UP
customer_reviews.author: walter goodwyn

customer_reviews.title: CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: JUST WATT I NEEDED. KEEPS MY CAR CHARGED WHEN NOT USING FOR A LONG TIME. GOOD SO FAR
customer_reviews.author: 1973EGG

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: It works great, the blue light comes on to let you know it's working. I have had no problems using it on my newer cars.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Works great keeping my 1983 Ford F-250's battery topped off
customer_reviews.text: Works great keeping my 1983 Ford F-250's battery topped off. I don't drive it a lot, so it occasionally needed a jump. This baby works great, and it is supposed to keep it from a negative drain when it's cloudy, which it is a lot where I live. Darn handy.
customer_reviews.author: John Cocktoeson

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok
customer_reviews.text: Good charger seems to keep my plow truck battery topped off. LED light on side shows when it is charging. Sort of flimsy and a bit cheap but for my purposes works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Maine Jeepah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Kept my boat battery topped off all summer. Using it on it this winter to keep a trickle to it.
customer_reviews.author: my two cents

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, even the smaller one!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, enough umph for even cloudy days! Using it on my van that draws down power from theft and interlock devices, and after wearing out my welcome with AAA, I can now start up with confidence. Go ahead and get it. I got the smaller charger.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: I am missing the alligator clips. I have another solar panel by Sunway and know I have to use the clips to charge battery. Last time I did not use the clips there was reverse polarity and it drained my battery. I need the clips please or I will be returning this item. What I like is the ease of installation and when properly set up it keeps my battery charged so I don’t need to keep removing and putting on a trickle charge
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Duncan

customer_reviews.title: My first panel failed to produce voltage and e mail ...
customer_reviews.text: My first panel failed to produce voltage and e mail contact with the company we tested the possibilities sequentially. I returned it and received a replacement promptly which works fine- just as advertised. I was impressed that the company patiently worked with me to be sure the first one was not working and had no reluctance to replace it. My battery has responded as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small package, works great
customer_reviews.text: Set up to trickle charger RV battery while in winter storage. So far works good
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Mc Geary

customer_reviews.title: Trickle charger
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my RV battery topped off during storage. It's water resistant and safe to use in the outdoors. I have this panel connected directly to a group24 battery.
customer_reviews.author: Raul M Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my golf cart and lawn tractor
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my battery charged on my gas powered golf cart and my lawn tractor. Using outdoors with no problems so far. It has been on my golf cart for 9 months with no problems. Just recently installed on my lawn tractor.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wire
customer_reviews.text: Panel works well, but the wire cord is very small gauge. It lasted 8 months before breaking at the panel. The panel was outside for the whole 8 months in New England weather. So a decent unit, but take care of the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Ceilidh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great at keeping the battery on my camper charged up and ready to go. I just attach it to the battery and set it on top of the battery case.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Matheny

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...for a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost 1yr ago. It worked perfectly. However, today I went to start my car and the battery is dead again. So frustrating. The little blue light is still blinking, so it gives the impression that it's still working--but it's not. I have re-ordered another brand.
customer_reviews.author: ClothesMinded

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. I keep it in my bag in case of emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt work, i hooked it up to my camper battery for winter to keep the battery charged, and i positioned it to get the most sun light, the blue light flashes so it should be charging, but every time i check the battery levels its dead, it has been hooked up for weeks, and i even had a full charge on the battery when i hooked it up so it wouldn't have to charge a dead battery. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: michaelparkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my RV Trailer's batteries charged while in storage
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my Sunday Solar Car Battery Charger. I use it with two (2) 13ft Sunday extension cables to help keep my RV trailer's batteries charged while in storage. Now I never have a dead battery.
customer_reviews.author: MABoschert

product_meta.title: Sunway Solar Car Battery Trickle Charger & Maintainer 12V Solar Panel Power Kit Portable Backup for Car Automotive RV Marine Boat Motorcycle Truck Trailer Tractor Powersports Snowmobile Farm Equipment
feature_bullets: [Solar Panel Power Up To 4W]--Keep your 12 Volt batteries topped off with this solar battery trickle charger ,which helps to manage 12v battery drain in all seasons. Designed to compensate for small, steady battery drains from the vehicle's clock or alarm system.

[Simple And Very Easy to Use]--This solar trickle charger will NOT overcharge the battery or cause any damage if the battery capacity is 20Ah or greater, .The solar charger panel mounts easily to the windshield or dash and conveniently plugs into your car's 12 volt cigarette lighter! Suction cups available with the solar charger. {If you need a Quick Connect And Disconnect Extension Cable For this solar charger,Please search the ASIN:B06X6LJTD6.}

[Stronger and Durable]--This solar powered battery charger is Covered with ultra clear PV glass which is more efficient and also with Durable ABS plastic housing which makes this solar panels charger more stronger. Low Maintenance!

[For Any Rechargeable 12Volt Batteries]--This solar battery trickle charger is the eco-friendly way to maintain and safely charges Wet, Gel, SLA, AGM and Deep Cycle batterie. It can maintain the charge of any cars, trucks, marines, motorcycles , tractors, ATVs, snowmobiles, boats and personal water crafts or RV 12 volt battery!

[Reverse Charging Protection]--With BUILT-IN DIODE for prevents reverse charging from batteries.With a 12volt LED charge indicator. The Led light up when it is charging. The solar charger maintainer Includes cigarette lighter adapter and alligator battery terminal clamps. We offer 12-Month warranty and good customer service.
